ROOMIELISTINGS.COM provides this information service free of cost and is not liable for any licensing or other requirements. People who provide child care service in their own homes are required by Public Act 116 to be registered or licensed by the State. This law was enacted for the protection of children in care. Those people who are not licensed/registered are in violation of the law. Should they choose to be licensed/registered they may call this toll free number: 877-302-2347 for an application packet. ROOMIELISTINGS.COM reserves the right to remove any listings or any advertisements for any reason. In no case shall ROOMIELISTINGS.COM be liable for any costs or events that occur beyond its control.
